00054         None = 0,
00055         Close = 1000,   /* User's QEvents space */

00064     public:

00075     class GestureServer : public QThread {
00076     public:
00077         GestureServer();
00078         GestureServer(const GestureServer&);
00084         GestureServer(OpticalObject*&, QObject&);
00085         virtual ~GestureServer();
00086 
00088         inline OpticalObject*& observer() { return *m_objectToObserve; }
00090         inline QObject& eventHandler() { return *m_eventHandler; }
00092         inline void setObserver(OpticalObject*& optObj) { m_objectToObserve = &optObj; }
00094         inline void setEventHandler(QObject& handler) { m_eventHandler = &handler; }
00095 
00096     protected:
00097         virtual void run();
